Name: The Golden Era
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1 dash Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: “My cocktail is inspired by the era of alcohol prohibition in the United States from 1919-1933. During this period marketing, agencies created memorable campaigns to attract Americans to visit Cuba, then considered “the unofficial US saloon”. The marketing campaign during this ‘Golden Era’ gave BACARDÍ one of its most famous tag lines “Fly to Cuba and bathe in BACARDÍ”.
History: Indian BACARDÍ Legacy 2013 winning cocktail created by Sudam Biswal at Miami Bar, Pune, India.
